title: Mobile Simulation Training for Enhancing Medical Team Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of healthcare team roles and awareness of patient safety concepts
context.additional_context: Team-based communication training conducted in a smartphone-based learning environment, cultivating real-world medical field response capabilities through role-playing and simulations

learning_goals: Apply TeamSTEPPS core tools (SBAR, check-back, etc.) with 80% accuracy in a virtual simulation environment
Identify at least three communication barriers that may arise during interdisciplinary collaboration in healthcare through role-playing
Demonstrate effective team decision-making with a score of 4 or higher (out of 5) on the simulation evaluation rubric

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
